summary.para: Causes a property to be read from the named property bag.

param.name: pszBagname
param.para: A pointer to a string that contains the name of the property bag.

param.name: pszPropName
param.para: A pointer to a string that contains the name of the property to be read.

param.name: pVar
param.para: The address of a VARIANT that, when this method returns successfully, receives the property value.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Removes a property from a named property bag.

param.name: pszBagname
param.para: A pointer to a string that contains the name of the property bag from which a property is to be removed.

param.name: pszPropName
param.para: A pointer to a string that contains the name of the property to remove.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Saves a property to the named property bag.

param.name: pszBagname
param.para: A pointer to a string that contains the name of the property bag.

param.name: pszPropName
param.para: A pointer to a string that contains the name of the property to write.

param.name: pVar
param.para: A pointer to a VARIANT that holds the new property value.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods that provide an object with a specified property bag in which the object can save its properties.
